attributes.action: Stop the cutting down of trees and widening of Chester Road through Pype Hayes, Erdington!
attributes.additional_details:
I want to stop the cutting down of trees and widening of Chester Road through what has always been known as "leafy" Pype Hayes, Erdington, there is a Primary School two minutes away from it and it would make the crossing very dangerous for children and parents, not to mention the destruction of the identity as a leafy suburb. It almost seems as if they are trying to build a motorway through our quaint community.
I want the Government to stop these plans going ahead.
